snippet.title: Trials Fusion | Launch Trailer [US]
snippet.description:
VISIT US AND STAY UPDATED
Go to our official site: http://trials.ubi.com
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/trials.official
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/trialsgames

The wait is over. The undisputed leader of the platform-racing genre is finally here! Whether you're racing to the top of the Leaderboards or blazing towards the finish line before your friends, Trials Fusion is a thrill ride with unlimited challenges. Make sure to stop by Track Central frequently to see what crazy new tracks have been created and uploaded by the amazing Trials track-building community.

See you on the Leaderboards!

The much-anticipated Trials game for the next-generation is available now for the PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Xbox 360 and on April 24, 2014 for the PC. Expand the world of Trials Fusion with the Season Pass—a $20 offer for six downloadable content packs that include new Career Mode tracks and new items for the Editor Mode. Take on an unlimited array of platform-racing challenges in the unreal world of Trials Fusion!
